title: Perth Scorchers Claim Historic Sixth BBL Title at Optus Stadium
details: The Perth Scorchers have reaffirmed their dominance in the Big Bash League by defeating the Sydney Sixers by 6 wickets to claim their sixth title. David Payne was named Player of the Match for his 3-18, while Mitch Marsh (44) and Josh Inglis (29*) guided the chase in front of a record home crowd of 55,018.

title: Rajshahi Warriors Clinch BPL 2026 Trophy with Dominant Final Win
details: Rajshahi Warriors were crowned champions of the 12th BPL season after a 63-run victory over Chattogram Royals in Mirpur. Tanzid Hasan Tamim stole the show with a historic century (100 off 62), becoming only the third player to hit a ton in a BPL final.

title: Hobart Hurricanes Women Secure Maiden WBBL|11 Championship
details: The Hobart Hurricanes made history by winning their first-ever WBBL title, defeating the Perth Scorchers Women by 8 wickets. Skipper Elyse Villani lifted the trophy in her final Big Bash appearance, ending her career on a fairytale high at Ninja Stadium.

title: ICC Expels Bangladesh from T20 World Cup 2026 Amid Security Stance
details: In a major blow to world cricket, the ICC has expelled Bangladesh from the upcoming Men's T20 World Cup after the BCB refused to travel to India for their fixtures, citing security concerns. Scotland has been named as the replacement team.
